settings.sub-hp-bnr-desp: Starting at just $19.96/month or purchase outright for $1796. Enjoy comfort and savings without compromise.

settings.sub-store-des: Our friendly experts are here to help! Whether you need product recommendations, advice, or assistance, we’re ready to guide you every step of the way.
Participate in our exclusive Walmart store giveaways and contests to win amazing prizes. Don’t miss out!
From product features to installation guides, we provide all the information you need to make confident decisions for your purchase.

settings.sub-cust-product-des: Perfect for modern homes that need reliable hot water with lower energy costs. This Bradford White power-vented unit delivers fast recovery and consistent performance - no more running out of hot water. Energy Star® certified for efficiency, and designed to keep your comfort uninterrupted.

For homes with a traditional chimney setup, this classic solution delivers reliable hot water even during power outages. The Bradford White Chimney Vented Water Heater offers quiet performance, low energy costs, and easy maintenance.

For modern homes that prefer simplicity and efficiency, the Bradford White Electric Water Heater delivers clean, quiet, and consistent hot water without the need for gas lines or venting. Engineered for low maintenance, reliable performance, and long-term peace of mind.

For homeowners who are ready to embrace high efficiency, the Bradford White Heat Pump Water Heater uses advanced air-to-heat technology to deliver powerful performance with up to 50% lower energy use.

Efficient and reliable, the Bradford White Power Direct Vent Water Heater offers superior performance with advanced venting technology, ensuring consistent hot water delivery. Perfect for homes requiring additional intake venting for code compliance and additional safety measures.

For busy households with high hot water demand, the Bradford White High-Output Power Vent Water Heater delivers powerful performance and fast recovery without skipping a beat. Energy Star Certified, ultra-efficient, and ready to keep up with your lifestyle.

For rural homes, cottages, and off-grid living, the Bradford White Power Vent Water Heater (Propane) delivers consistent hot water with high efficiency and fast recovery. Ideal where natural gas isn’t available, and comfort is still non-negotiable.

settings.sub-compare-text: Too many choices? Simplify it here.

settings.title: A Smarter Way to Choose Your Next Water Heater
settings.title-des: We know replacing a water heater isn't something you do every day. That’s why Go Lime focuses on what actually matters when it’s time to upgrade - zero-pressure, expert guidance, long-term reliability, and a frictionless experience from start to finish
settings.title-heading: We help you compare, not guess.
settings.title-desp: Every model includes key details and expert-written insights so you can choose based on real needs: layout, fuel type, and budget.
settings.title-heading-1: Returning your old tank? We’ve got it covered.
settings.title-desp-1: If you're switching from another provider, we’ll remove your current unit and return it to your old supplier on your behalf.
settings.title-anker: Learn how the return process works
settings.title-desp-2: Browse and order fully online or get help instantly from a real HVAC expert. No pressure, no upsells.
settings.title-desp-3: Explore guides, comparisons, and expert answers in our Water Heater Resource Center
settings.title-desp-4: Looking for compact, on-demand performance? Explore our full range of tankless water heaters designed for efficiency and continuous hot water.

settings.go-flx-heading: Make The Right Choice With Go Flex

settings.sub-lime-des: Your journey to hassle-free home comfort begins here. Dive into our online store to discover energy-efficient solutions with clear, upfront pricing - no surprises, just simplicity.
Once you've found the perfect fit for your home, place your order online or connect with one of our friendly experts for tailored advice. We're here to help, no pressure, no gimmicks.
Sit back and relax while we handle the hard work. Our team offers free, flexible, same-day installation - because your comfort shouldn’t wait.

settings.slider-custom-text-desp: I just replaced my hot water heater. I stumbled across this company online and read the good reviews. Price was much better than other companies, so I was skeptical. I called Saturday afternoon, confirmed online Saturday night, and the work was completed Sunday afternoon. I have been so impressed with the service from my phone conversation with Juan to the installation by Alireza. Now I can only hope that the product is as good as the price, technicians, and customer service

Finally, purchased today, scheduled installation over the weekend. For comparison I have checked with Home Depot and they quoted $2200 +tax. Rheeem 50 Gallon power vent $1489 is the item they will install, so roughly $700 installation fees. They won’t return the old one. Not sure about Costco pricing, they have $300 Gift Card. I don’t think anyone else would sell less than Go Lime. Thanks.

I just had Go Lime install my new hot water tank, and everything went great. No issues at all, and you can't beat the price. Some people complained about the fan on the hot water tank being super loud, but I don’t have that issue at all. In fact, it’s quieter than my old tank

This is the third time I met Ashraf to do the services at my home, everytime the next experience waa wonderful than the previous one, he is extremely knowledgeable and imparts wonderful professionalism. He not only fixed the issues but gave me the tips & advices how to maintain and keep running the systems. He is very courteous, friendly and helpful, I will definitely will recommend him100% for the jobs and want to see him if I have the service calls.

settings.custom-div: Join Thousands of Happy Ontario Homeowners

settings.pd-heading: Does my monthly price ever go up?
settings.pd-desp: Our pricing isn’t a flashy promotional rate - it’s fair and transparent from the start. Over time, there may be minor adjustments to ensure you continue receiving top-notch service. But don’t worry - we’re talking about just a dollar or two per year at most. No surprises, just straightforward savings. Plus, you can purchase the equipment at any time, giving you ultimate savings and flexibility.

Moving? No problem. Our Go Flex plan is fully transferable to the next homeowner, allowing them to seamlessly pick up where you left off. Just let us know 30 days before your move, and we’ll handle the rest. We’re here to make your move hassle-free, just the way it should be.

settings.pd-heading: What is the warranty with my purchase?
settings.pd-desp: With the Go Flex Program, you’re 100% covered—24/7/365—for both parts and labour, including annual maintenance. If you choose to purchase the equipment, you’ll receive the standard manufacturer’s warranty. Start with the Go Flex Program to enjoy all the benefits we offer, and when you’re ready, you can purchase the equipment at your convenience.

settings.pd-heading: How long have you been in business?
settings.pd-desp: Go Lime has been keeping homes comfortable since 2011. With over 150,000 customers across Ontario, we’ve spent more than a decade earning the trust of homeowners just like you. Partnering with trusted names like Enbridge, Home Depot, and Walmart, you can count on the Go Lime team to take care of your family.

settings.pd-heading: Is Go Flex a rental, and what is the term?
settings.pd-desp: Go Flex isn’t a never-ending rental contract. It’s a game-changer: an industry-first flexible 180-month subscription with an anytime purchase option. Here’s how it works: 50% of your monthly payment reduces your purchase price, while the other 50% covers 24/7 service, annual maintenance, and unlimited parts and labour coverage. You get all the perks of ownership without the headaches—and the flexibility to purchase the equipment at any time.

settings.pd-heading: What happens to my old tank?
settings.pd-desp: We’ve got it covered. We’ll take care of draining, disconnecting, and removing your old tank, even returning it to your previous supplier. If you’re still under contract, you’ll be responsible for any fees or buyouts from your current provider. You won’t have to lift a finger (except maybe to wave goodbye to the hassle).

settings.pd-heading: What is the process for returning my old water heater to my existing provider?
settings.pd-desp: For your convenience, we ensure that your old water heater is returned to the existing provider within 30 calendar days. Our team handles the process efficiently, so you don’t have to worry about a thing. If you have any questions or need further assistance, we're always here to help.

settings.pd-heading: What size tank water heater should I buy?
settings.pd-desp: The ideal size depends on how many people live in your home and how much hot water you use. A 50-gallon tank is the most common one. Ultimately, it varies based on your daily habits if you're unsure, we're happy to help you find the right fit for your needs.

settings.pd-heading: Can I upgrade from a chimney vent to a power vent water heater?
settings.pd-desp: Yes, it’s possible. However, you’ll need an electrical outlet nearby and proper venting to the exterior. Our experts can assess your setup and recommend the best upgrade option for your home.

settings.pd-heading: Can I install these water heaters myself?
settings.pd-desp: We don’t recommend it. Installing a water heater involves plumbing, gas, or electrical connections and must meet local building codes. Professional installation ensures safe operation, optimal performance, and protects your warranty.

settings.plant-desp: Every order supports reforestation. For each purchase made, we plant a tree because real change starts with simple actions. Place an order, and we’ll plant a tree on your behalf.
